books.author: by Marcus Luttrell with Patrick Robinson
books.description: The only survivor of a Navy SEALs operation in northern Afghanistan describes his escape.
books.name: LONE SURVIVOR

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of "The O'Reilly Factor" recounts the events leading up to Jesus' execution.
books.name: KILLING JESUS

books.author: by Charles Krauthammer
books.description: Three decades’ worth of essays from the conservative columnist.
books.name: THINGS THAT MATTER

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of "The Tipping Point" and "Outliers."
books.name: DAVID AND GOLIATH

books.author: by Jordan Belfort
books.description: The rise and ugly fall of a high-living investment-firm founder. First published in 2007; the basis for the movie.
books.name: THE WOLF OF WALL STREET

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
books.description: The story of the Culper spy ring, which aided the American cause during the Revolution.
books.name: GEORGE WASHINGTON'S SECRET SIX

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A memoir by a Brooklyn woman whose relationship with a drug runner gets her sentenced to a year in prison. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Doris Kearns Goodwin
books.description: The relationship between Theodore Roosevelt and William Howard Taft and the activities of the muckraking press, from the author of “Team of Rivals.”
books.name: THE BULLY PULPIT

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET

books.author: by Solomon Northup
books.description: The narrative, first published in 1853, of a freeman who was kidnapped and sold into slavery, and spent 12 years in bondage before escaping; the basis of the recently released movie.
books.name: TWELVE YEARS A SLAVE

books.author: by Daniel Kahneman
books.description: The winner of the Nobel in economic science discusses how we make choices.
books.name: THINKING, FAST AND SLOW

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN
